basic_information.scholarship_name: The Tyler Henry Memorial Endowed Scholarship for Debate

description: Established in memory and honor of a UCO debater, Tyler Henry, this scholarship assists a student who has completed 12 hours at UCO and has been accepted to the Debate Team. Eligibility Requirements Accepted onto the Debate team Completed a minimum of 12 hours at UCO Provide letter describing influences in declared major, financial need, and special circumstances

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
